topic.title: In China, Jews are pushing the Talmud as a Business Guide
topic.body:
“I’ve heard a couple of [Chinese] people say that Jews are smart because of the Talmud. But they don’t seem to know what it is. I think they see it as some sort of secret intelligence book,” added Rabbi Nussin Rodin, a Beijing-based emissary of the Chabad-Lubavitch movement.
http://www.newsweek.com/china-pushing-talmud-business-guide-69075
